text: Whose Life Is It Anyway? is an American drama movie from 1981. It was directed by John Badham. It started Richard Dreyfuss. It was a movie version of a 1972 television movie and a 1978 stage play. Both of these were called the same thing as the movie. Whose Life Is It Anyway? has a 70% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. The movie is about a sculptor (a person who makes sculptures). He gets paralyzed and decides he wants to die, but he cannot kill himself on his own because he cannot move. He asks a doctor for help. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 drama movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies about suicide Category:Movies about disabilities Category:Movies directed by John Badham Category:Movies based on plays
title: Whose Life Is It Anyway?
